title: Learn JavaScript ES6 Features
body: Study let, const, arrow functions, template literals, and destructuring in JavaScript.

title: Build a TypeScript Project
body: Create a simple Node.js app using TypeScript with proper types and interfaces.

title: Integrate Prisma with PostgreSQL
body: Set up Prisma ORM in a project and connect it to a PostgreSQL database.

title: Practice TypeScript Utility Types
body: Explore utility types like Partial, Pick, Omit, and Record in TypeScript.

title: Write Prisma Schema
body: Define a user and post model using Prisma schema and run migrations.
